p{font-size:20px}@keyframes popup{0%{transform:scale(.1)}to{transform:scale(1)}}.back{transform-style:preserve-3d;transform:rotateY(180deg);animation-name:zoom2}.back,.front{animation-duration:1s}.front{opacity:1;animation-name:zoom,flip;z-index:2}@keyframes flip{0%{opacity:0}15%{opacity:0}16%{opacity:1}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes zoom{0%{transform:scale(1) rotateY(-180deg)}50%{transform:scale(1.1) rotateY(0deg)}75%{transform:scale(1)
